name: BABABOBOS :)
wishText: On this special day,as the sun graces the horizon with its golden glow,it's a time not just to mark another year passed,but to celebrate your beautiful souls.Like delicate flowers embracing the morning light,may you both continue to blossom into your most authentic selves,exuding warmth and freedom with every step you take.May the melody of laughter and the dance of joy accompany you through every moment,weaving into the fabric of your shared journey,creating a tapestry rich with love and wonder.As you navigate life's twists and turns together,may the whispers of your hearts serve as your compass, guiding you towards the boundless treasures of love, wisdom, and inner peace. Happy birthday, dear Mitahi and Mahi! May your radiance illuminate the world, growing brighter with each passing year, filling it with joy and inspiration
textInChatBox: Happy birthday mera bababobos!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special cuz you are C.N iykwim
outroText: Pasand aaya toa babs bheju aur pyar krow.
